data.text: @BetteMidler The Shubert Theatre erupted upon your initial appearance on stage. First time I experienced Playbills flung high in the Air in Celebration, Joy and yes, delirium. It was a magical evening... https://t.co/vRdYhB1aA2

@BetteMidler Thank you for the best broadway performance I’ve ever had the honor of witnessing. My friend and I were able to get rush tickets and I cried from start to finish from the standing room aisleway. Truly unforgettable experience! 😭😭😭
@BetteMidler Notice the mullet hair style lol soo 80’s 😊

@BetteMidler Much love and congrats to you, Ms. Bette! You are a National Treasure! A Force for Justice in a time when we need it more than ever!  Live long(er) and Prosper( more)!!  Your beautiful voice could bring Joy to the saddest of Hearts & healing to the most broken of Souls! Rage on!

@BetteMidler I was privileged to be there for that show and have to say your performance was absolutely amazing! You and the rest of the cast put so much into this show. The standing O’s were well deserved!
@BetteMidler Oh please tell me you are coming to the Pantages in January.   I’ll put on my Sunday clothes!!   #hellodollyhopes
@BetteMidler 35 years ago tonight I was thrilled to attend one of many of your detour Art or bust shows this one was at Jones Beach Ny thank you Bette 😘 https://t.co/Uf7qHpre6V
@BetteMidler It was a wonderful production! History! Love from Cape May, N.J.
@BetteMidler I don’t get to Broadway very often, but I was lucky enough to get to see you do your iconic Dolly in your first run—what a fabulous experience!  Thank you for being a national treasure!
@BetteMidler Much love for our @BetteMidler ❤
@BetteMidler I'm so happy I saw this show . . . twice!
@BetteMidler I so have to see this production seeing as I’m Dolly too!
@BetteMidler Congratulations Bette love you 😘 https://t.co/VYNLr3LFfc
@BetteMidler I saw you the night before and thought you were fantastic.

@BetteMidler So grateful for the opportunity to see this production. Is there a way to get autographed photos? My wife is a huge fan of yours and an autographed photo for her upcoming 50th birthday would be a priceless gift!
@luhess @ChristyL17 @BetteMidler I night and performance I will never, ever forget!
@alisaquint @JBurrel47549198 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Wow, amazing!!!

@alisaquint @ChristyL17 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler WoW! My brother wore her albums OUT when we first got our “serious” stereo. When he passed away last year, yep, CDs of Barbra! Meet tired of his nightingale ❣️
@BetteMidler Love Bette‼️ I saw her in SF in the 70’s when neither one of us knew what compost was.

@ChristyL17 @JBurrel47549198 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler I saw Barbra 17 times as a teenager in FG not to mention sneaking in after the intermission and at the stage door.
FABULOUS‼️
@BetteMidler #HelloBette https://t.co/TfWQ7d7ykr
@BetteMidler https://t.co/0lIxdN3O3k

@BetteMidler Congratulations Bette! What a wonderful experience...twice. I’m so thankful to have gotten to see you on the second round. You are amazing. Please don’t let this be the last opportunity. Do more!!
@BetteMidler Just amazing 🙏🏻😘
@BetteMidler Wonderful, congratulations!! 🌹from a Paterson girl.
@BetteMidler Seeing you in @HelloDollyBway gave me memories I will cherish for a lifetime. Thank you for the gift of you! ❤️
@BetteMidler Congratulations
@BetteMidler Come To London with Dolly!!!!!!!!
@BetteMidler You'll always be a legend.  I think your awesome.
@BetteMidler I was blessed to see the show before it closed.
@BetteMidler I saw the matinee on Saturday and you were beyond fabulous!
@BetteMidler I saw your show a couple of weeks ago. You and the cast were awesome!  Thank you!!  And did you throw food to the band director every show?
@BetteMidler I wish I’d been there 😘🌈💋❤️
@BetteMidler I first saw you perform at The Bergen Mall in 1971.... From that day forward You were already a Legend in my book for sooo many reasons.... now you are a Broadway legend!

@BetteMidler I totally read this in your C.C. Bloom voice! <3 <3 <3 

"Wasn't that something? Did you like my speech? I didn't mean a word of it! Did you see those other broads gnashing their teeth?"
@BetteMidler Oh no was hoping it was on until December when I get over there 🤷‍♀️😩😢

@BetteMidler @BetteMidler I was honored and filled with joy and emotion to see you on Friday 8/24 in Hello Dolly!! You were FANTASTIC.  U DESREVE EVERY STANDING O.  BLESSINGS YOUR WAY! have followed ur career for many years. U r like expensive wine.
@BetteMidler Saw you twice and wish I could have over and over again! Truly amazing.

@BetteMidler Lucky me, I saw you at the final Wednesday matinee. Sat in the front row and got to shake your hand! Such a magical moment in the theater. Such joy at a time in this country when we REALLY need it. THANK YOU, DOLLY! ❤️
@BetteMidler Sounds incredible!  Are you bringing #HelloDolly to the UK ???
@BetteMidler We flew in from Scotland on Wednesday and saw the show Thursday.. amazing and so so funny!! Made our NYC trip! 😍 https://t.co/pVHgvCQVO6
@BetteMidler @HelloDollyBway You were brilliant!

@BetteMidler Congratulations on an amazing run. The show was absolutely stunning - filled with optimism, heart and hope.  My face still hurts from smiling / crying with joy. Thank you for all of the above! Can’t wait to see what you do next. The world can always use a hearty dose of Divine!
@BetteMidler @HelloDollyBway So glad I got to see this fantastic production - truly one I can say I saw it
@beirnerirrobert @ChristyL17 @BetteMidler From the opening chord of the orchestra and through the entire curtain call!!
@ChristyL17 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler When were the standing ovations?
@BetteMidler I bet it was a wonderful night I wish I could have been there!
@BetteMidler Thank you Bette Midller , for lighting up Broadway! And for your kindness  and joy.....love you!
@BetteMidler @JJaazzee1 ...and yes, i know, that's what stalkers say...but in my case its true...

@BetteMidler You're still glowin', you're still crowin', you're still goin' strong.

Standing at the end of the road boys
Waiting for my new friends to come.
I don't care if I'm hungry or poor,
I'm gonna get some of them.

I cry tears of joy for you, and have since DIVINE MISS M
@BetteMidler So sad I didn’t get to see you in this. Mad love for you Miss M.

@willowgreen1 @ChristyL17 @BetteMidler My dad made his career as a dentist, but his love was music. Played classical clarinet (natl gold medal in HS) & in a dance band during WWII. Was blind last 2 yrs. He said it was ok, he just listen to all the music he knew. Sweet man 🎶 https://t.co/3JbjSNcd6W

@ChristyL17 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Like my blessing of seeing Nureyev dance through his career - even once before partner w Fontaine, w her & after... overlapping with legends
WOW
@BetteMidler Saw it last year.. you were wonderful!
@ChristyL17 @JBurrel47549198 @BetteMidler @BarbraStreisand Yes she is and her 1994 concert is another lifetime memory that still does rise to the last performance of Hello Dolly on August 25th!

@willowgreen1 @JBurrel47549198 @BetteMidler @BarbraStreisand That's awesome! I saw her in Timeless in L.A. and when she opened Barclays in Brooklyn and this recent tour in Ft. Laud and Miami. I'm in a few of the audience shots on her Netflix special. Met her on the Guilt Trip set years ago. Shes amazing!

@ChristyL17 @JBurrel47549198 @BetteMidler I experienced the vinyl record as a child and was only 1 1/2 when @BarbraStreisand was in Funny Girl on Broadway! I have lived through her music and saw her live at the Palace of Auburn Hills in 1994. I took my grandmother and my son was turning 5!

@JBurrel47549198 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Ok now, I'm jealous about you seeing Barbra in FG. 😉 She's my other hero besides Bette. Wish I had been alive to experience that. That must have been amazing!!!
@JBurrel47549198 @ChristyL17 @BetteMidler Memories that leave a handprint on your heart, soul and mind.

@ChristyL17 @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler What  memories, wish I’d experienced Bette’s Dolly!
100 yrs ago(?!) I saw C Channing in HD, Streisand Funny Girl & Sammy D JR Golden Boy in a week...& the Beatles were in town for 1st tour, staying in hotel across street...memories❣️
@ChristyL17 @BetteMidler I can’t believe we were in the same theater on at least two occasions (LOL)!
@willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Yes, I was at that one too!

@ChristyL17 @BetteMidler I’m with you. I cannot imagine a night of theater topping the August 25th final performance of Hello Dolly and we were at the January 14th matinee with Bruce Springsteen sitting behind my son!
@willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Yes, I dont think I'll ever witness anything like that again. 11 standing ovations. What a night!
@BetteMidler Was an amazing show!!  I felt so fortunate to see you in it; your work with David Hyde Pierce was incredibly fun.  Thanks for making it special for us.
@BetteMidler Congratulations!
@BetteMidler Was lucky to be there the first night! I played in the #HelloDolly chorus at @WoodrowWildcats HS in #Dallas way back when and wanted to sing along with you!

@BetteMidler You were my mother's favorite performer and, sadly, she never got to see you live. My 9-year-old daughter and I saw you in November to honor my mom. And boy, all I could think of is, "She would've LOVED this." Thank you for a wonderful memory.
@BetteMidler It was fabulous - we saw you all back in January, and it was an amazing show. You all seemed to be having so much fun - just a joy to watch. Thank you!!
@BetteMidler that's fabulous darling but what I would like to know is are you planning to bring hello dolly to London I do hope so love you lots glenn.xxxx
@BetteMidler Congratulations! Thanks for all the thrills over the years.

@BetteMidler It was a pleasure to see you in it in the winter of 2017... we laughed... then someone passed out... then an ambulance came... then we laughed some more.. then the fainting soul returned... it was a show in a show and it was GREAT!
@BetteMidler Such a petty man.
@BetteMidler You are FABULOUS!
@BetteMidler You were fantastic in Hello Dolly! So thrilled I got to see it this month! Love that show!
@BetteMidler Wish I could have seen it...I am sure it was epic, after all, you are the Divine Miss M. 💕
@BetteMidler You are awesome Bette, a real living Legend. An amazing lady. You inspire us all. Cheers
@BetteMidler Congratulations @BetteMidler !
@BetteMidler YES GIRL, GET IT 👏🏻👏🏻
@BetteMidler Blessed to have been there for closing night. It was epic!  Best night at the theater ever. Thank you to all.

@BetteMidler Bette will you be making an announcement soon that you are bringing it to London? I do hope so,us Brits are waiting in anticipation for news don't keep us in agony for news too long, Pleeze Bette we want to see you again and the marvellous production of Hello Dolly here in the UK

@BetteMidler I just watched "The Rose" with my 22-year-old daughter and her girlfriend for the first time Saturday night. (I saw it at the theater in '79 when I was 16.) They both loved it, and I was once again reminded of what an amazing performer you are.
@BetteMidler Beyond bummed that I will miss seeing you in such a perfect role!! Will have taken me 56 years to get to NYC, but 2 months too late. :-(
@BetteMidler NOW, maybe you can go on tour with #TheResistance and talk at rallies!  You'd be great!!

@BetteMidler @lkjtexas I wish I could have seen it. Darn it. 

Is there anyway she could bring it to Austin, Texas? 😍🙋‍♀️💐
@BetteMidler Is it finished??? 😫😭😭😭
@BetteMidler @susanpenhaligon @BetteMidler really looking forward to seeing ypu in the show when it comes to London.  Will the UK's phenomenal @Charlie_Stemp. also be in the show to ?
@BetteMidler Love back to you - saw u in it a few weeks ago and it was amazing, as were you!
@BetteMidler High school choir trip 1983. Only broadway show I ever attended was “a Chorus Line” at the Shubert Theater!!!!! Congrats Bette, lifelong fan!!!!
@BetteMidler Now...WHERE'S the Soundtrack? https://t.co/VUoCLCyLhS
@BetteMidler Thank you for doing the show. I’ve seen your concerts multiple times over the years as well as your Sue Mengers show. But Dolly was extra special

@BetteMidler I’ve never attended a show on Broadway 🎭. Everyone who did see your show thought you were brilliant. So pleased you feel the glory. You give the world your talent and for us ... it’s grand.
@BetteMidler Frankly I wonder sometimes what it's been like to be someone like you, who's doubtless had many such career highs, so that you have the great luxury to compare them.  What good fortune.

@BetteMidler The last @hellodollybway show was such a gift to the audience from you and everyone involved with the show. My friends & I were so charged by the energy in the Shubert, we partied all night.  Overslept Sunday & missed a Bway show we planned to attend.
@BetteMidler @SammySettanni :)
@BetteMidler You and Carrol I never thought anyone else... but you can relate! Hope the make the movie again w you in it!
@BetteMidler I would love it if you could write, direct, produce and star in a production about Mae West. 💖💕😁💕🇨🇦💕
@BetteMidler You are just a star. Big love always.
@BetteMidler I have to respectfully disagree. 😘 This was your life's greatest night. 👇 https://t.co/zxYDMpX22K
@BetteMidler Lucky enough to have seen this last November. The Hello Dolly number was the single greatest scene I have ever seen on Broadway.
@BetteMidler Congratulations, Queen Bette! To the entire cast & crew, as well!
@BetteMidler I saw Saturday matinee, four times now @HelloDollyBway! PLEASE COME BACK.🙏. U r THE BEST.  #BravoDivineMissM. We ❤️ U!
@BetteMidler Please help me share to get Ted Cruz out! https://t.co/sjg2dNLcNd
@BetteMidler Congratulations Ms Midler!
@BetteMidler You are one awesome lady Bette Midler
@BetteMidler The best night of my life too ... the last time I saw Hello Dolly on Broadway was with Betty Grabel  in the 60’s with my parents ... it was my first broadway show ❤️
@BetteMidler Good for you
@BetteMidler I wish it had been filmed for Broadway HD or Great Performances. Some of your greatest fans could not get to NYC to see your historic portrayal of Dolly Levi. 😢

@BetteMidler I feel lucky that I got to see you & this amazing cast in this wonderful show! More importantly, my 11 yo son & 15 yo daughter got to witness your brilliance! Thank you for pouring your heart out on that stage! We'll always have the laughter you gave us that night in our hearts!
@BetteMidler Thanks to the cast , from my little performer to you. Thanks you to so many who stopped to sign her playbill and actually talk  to her about her acting https://t.co/LPMf5NSQIN

@BetteMidler Perhaps the greatest night of theatre (and I am fortunate to have had many) was the night I sat front row center to see you in this production. I came by myself and by evening’s end I was part of a tribe with the people to my right and left. We were united by the joy of it all.
@BetteMidler OMG you had to be amazing in that role.

@BetteMidler You were tremendous. My family was thrilled and honored to honor you and that wonderful cast, at closing night. My 13 year old daughter, who also performs , was thrilled to get her Playbill signed by so many cast members. Your ad libs were spot on as were a few others, Thank You
@BetteMidler And so thrilled to have seen it 4th row centre for my birthday July 19th!! The love across that theatre was historic, palpable and magic

@BetteMidler I am so happy my mother and I were able to (finally) see you and your amazing talent last week.  It was her life long dream and we both cried the second you came on stage.  Thank you for Hello Dolly and for making this world a much funnier and better place.  Xo
@BetteMidler Congratulations!
@BetteMidler Saw you in July and LOVED it!!! So... whats next? 👍🏻😁❤️💋

@BetteMidler NOW your coming to West End, YES, then Mame pleeze Bette, in celebration of the end of your run on Broadway I listened to the CD to be with you all in spirit unforgettable memories of my visit to NY last year specially to see you,Hello Dolly has been uplifting experience for many
@BetteMidler Any chance it eas recorded ?
@BetteMidler I'm sorry I missed it, B.Mid.  How are you today?
@BetteMidler Standing O's sounds nice
@BetteMidler Congrats!!

@BetteMidler I love you Darlin!!!

Congratulations!!!

I "Bette" it was a wild crowd!

I shure hope I have the pleasure of your company one o these days

You are amazing hon!
😉
All the Best!!!
💖💗💖💗💖💗💖💗💋

@BetteMidler Congratulations on an incredible run!!!!!
#HelloDollyBway https://t.co/tBgTObw4Ag
@BetteMidler We saw you a year ago. From the Divine Miss M to New Years in Chicago till now have Loved you. Keep on keeping on. And keep on speaking up. This country needs your voice.

@BetteMidler I've never seen a show on broadway before..
But it sounds like it would be a pretty damn good time :)
@BetteMidler 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻saw you a year ago and it was historic. The best of the best ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
@BetteMidler DIVA DIVA DIVA!!!
@BetteMidler Are you bringing the show to SF?
@BetteMidler We love you Bette!!💋💋😍😘😘😘😘😘🇺🇸🌺🌷⚘🌺🌺🌺🌼🌱⚘🌷💙💋💋
@BetteMidler I was there and it was a once in a lifetime theatrical experience. https://t.co/jb75HiRCkp
@BetteMidler Saw Hello Dolly in September as part of our 50th wedding anniversary celebration and you were on my "bucket list" to be seen.  Loved every minute of the play!!!  Thank you!

@ChristyL17 @BetteMidler I am sure it was !
😆😆😆😆😆😆👍
@BetteMidler Congratulations, Bette! I'm glad everything went well and smoothly.
@BetteMidler I just saw the matinee this past Wednesday.  Brilliant! Just BRILLIANT!
@GordonHarmony @BetteMidler Thanks, it was thrilling!
@BetteMidler Saw you at the Fox Theatre in Atlanta way back in 1983.  And I'm STILL in love with your voice!
@BetteMidler My third time at the show, and certainly one of the best nights of MY life, also! You're a gem.

@BetteMidler @DianeAnanda I saw u the night u took that awful tumble. We thought there was no way u’d be able to finish. But u bounced back & performed ur heart out. 

We shall do the same. Trump was a huge fall during the show, but we will dust ourselves off & keep going just like our dear Miss Midler!
@BetteMidler Saw you in Dolly last year - a real lovefest. You are the greatest Ms. Midler!
@BetteMidler Loved the show.

@BetteMidler @jyester55 So sorry I never got to enjoy your Hello Dolly, Bette!
I loved “Hello Dolly!” and lived so much of my college life  to “The Divine Miss M!” You are a FORCE!
@BetteMidler Soon, you’re always great
@BetteMidler I wish i could have seen the show. Both you and Hello Dooly are my favorite
@BetteMidler I was at the Wednesday, August 22 matinee and you and the entire cast were excellent. Thank you.
@BetteMidler Congrats, Bravo, Encore and all that jazz!!! You Go Gurl😉😉😉 - Baron Bruce Radio Personality at WSNC 90.5FM https://t.co/msptRbWF2z

@BetteMidler So excited to be there for the last night❣️🎉👐🏻🍾 It was truly magical❣️ You and the rest of the cast really brought it! And the audience was right there to give you all the love and adoration you deserved. Two days later and still feeling the magic of this. Thank you❣️
@BetteMidler Love you

@BetteMidler God bless you, thank you, my Mom and I were in the audience on July24th, I wept!
#BetteMidlerownsBroadway
@BetteMidler https://t.co/ro2EOJvuWZ
@BetteMidler You’re such a shinning star of an example Of humanity ms Midler 👌😘❤️
@BetteMidler Lucky me lady, I saw you 1st run and I saw it this one. Thank you for the gift of that performance.
@BetteMidler Congrats to you and entire cast
@BetteMidler To think that in 1962, you were in Honolulu Community Theatre's "How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying." You've come a long way, baby! https://t.co/FPLPAlPG2y
@baumann_mich @BetteMidler You were right!! Incredible! Happy you got to be there!!

@ChristyL17 @BetteMidler Yes - I think you and your friend were on the aisle, then it was me, my friend, and two other guys after that. Third time seeing the show, and was the most surreal and amazing broadway experience I’ve ever had.
@BetteMidler July 2017- seeing you had long been on my bucket list. You were phenomenal & we had a wonderful time. Congratulations on a fantastic run. https://t.co/eJgItOWnxT
@BetteMidler Wish I was there again!

@BetteMidler It was amazing! I met some young ladies because of this show. My mother and I came and were honored to be there. My dad loved you and we know he would have loved to come if he was still with us. Blessed to meet people like “the girl with the Bette bag” and several cast!
@BetteMidler Now that is a healthy tweet. Focus on things like this Bette. Stay away from the foolish tweets like a deceased woman’s thanksgiving turkey.
@baumann_mich @BetteMidler You must have been sitting next to her. Small world!
@BetteMidler Saw Thenlroduction earlier and it was FANTASTIC
@baumann_mich @BetteMidler My friend was to the right of me. What an amazing night!!
@BetteMidler So jealous that I just don't have the opportunity to see such a fabulous show! Congrats to the whole cast. Sounds amazing.
@BetteMidler Don't ever go away again Bette.   Congrats to all.
@BetteMidler My in-laws saw your show and are still singing your praises.
@BetteMidler #BotoxicBette stick to the world of make believe and leave the real world to the adults. That would make the housepainter and homemaker rest easy!
@BetteMidler Was fortunate to see it twice Memorable isn’t even sufficient #ILoveBette
@BetteMidler Sounds like Trump speaking
@BetteMidler @bmeersand
@BetteMidler Is it time for you to get some rest? I have seen you were in concert many times you are divine. I will be on it one day to see you on Broadway
@BetteMidler Congratulations!
@BetteMidler Bette YOU ARE DOLLY!
@BetteMidler Wow, wow, wow fellas...
@ChristyL17 @BetteMidler I think we were right next to you (the two guys to your right)
@BetteMidler Bette for President! ❤️
@BetteMidler Sorry we missed it.
@BetteMidler Congratulations!!! Well-deserved!
@BetteMidler One of the best nights of my life too. Laughed and some tears from the front row. Raspy voice from the cheering. Amazing final show. My view of curtain call: https://t.co/Q2vK8hZjhc
@BetteMidler Seeing you in that role was one of the highlights of my life. Thank you!
@BetteMidler Congratulations @BetteMidler  ❤️💕
@luhess @willowgreen1 @BetteMidler Yes, thank you!!!
@BetteMidler @SethRudetsky Seeing Bette Midler was a memory I will treasure forever!
@BetteMidler Thank you Bette for a great show and run! I saw you Tuesday and you and the entire cast was glorious!
@BetteMidler My niece and I will never forget seeing your performance in Hello Dolly you were amazing, as well as the entire cast! Live theatre is so beautiful.
@BetteMidler I wish you would tweet cool shit like this more often.
@pcmaclearnfixdo @BetteMidler How great Betsy! Must have been fabulous.

@BetteMidler Oh Bette! I will never forget it either! I was an emotional wreck! Finally back home in England but it was worth it to see you close this legendary musical! Amazing cast and the best Dolly in my eyes now and forever. 😘💕💃🌟
@BetteMidler https://t.co/rG4ADz8Czp
@BetteMidler to be topped only when trump is voted out..
@BetteMidler @SethRudetsky It was on my bucket list to see you! I'm so glad I was able to see you closing night. You were so divine!
@BetteMidler Well deserved, miss M
@BetteMidler You forgot to bash Trump in your tweet : (
@BetteMidler Now go make some comedies !!! America needs you to make us laugh !!  Congrats BTW!!
@BetteMidler Congratulations to all😁👏💫
@BetteMidler Wish I could have seen it. Will it be on Great Performances soon?
@BetteMidler Congratulations!
@BetteMidler Stunningly beautiful, exceptionally talented Bette Midler. Our globe has truly been blessed by her existence!
@BetteMidler Please bring it to The West End Bette. please xxxx

@BetteMidler Brava Bravissima
Hey ya did good toots
@BetteMidler How Wonderful! Congratulations 🎈🎊🍾🎉
@BetteMidler Any chance of a west end transfer?
@BetteMidler I wasn't there, however you are the greatest and I'm sure all were in the presence of total greatest. Please come to the UK xx
@BetteMidler Saw you in it last summer... you committed 110%... just remarkable.
@BetteMidler Mazel Tov.
@BetteMidler Pleassssssee bring it to London 👏

@BetteMidler Man....I wish I could’ve seen you my sweet Devine...But I was always there in spirit cheering you on to feel the love from the crowd because you my sweet mama earth will ALWAYS be The RoSe 🌹 inside our thriving garden....xoxo
@BetteMidler Bette, I wish your were touring, I’m seeing Betty Buckley on opening night in Chicago on October 23. So excited.
@BetteMidler Are you bringing it to the West End?
@BetteMidler @OldManRiver1800 Argh close the week before I come to nyc.  😤
@BetteMidler First show by you I haven't seen in a while. But now getting the off-broadway version. You are an American Treasure, @BetteMidler
@BetteMidler What a thrill it was to see you twice in your original run, you are forever Dolly to me
@BetteMidler Dear Bette - for sooo many decades of enjoyment of your talents from humor to deep soul touching moments and songs , you’re my favorite waste of time ❤️
@BetteMidler https://t.co/JJdYLSOtl5
@BetteMidler it was fabulous sat night! these from final perf... https://t.co/ycAMeK0SXI
@BetteMidler Sending love right back to you Bette thank you so much ❤️
@willowgreen1 @ChristyL17 @BetteMidler is this your hand, @ChristyL17 ? https://t.co/PHmFVzaebk
@BetteMidler @LesDennis a part you were born to play Bette
@BetteMidler Congratulations to you the entire cast and crew. Thank you for the joy your hard work brings to so many people.
@BetteMidler Wished I could of seen it. I Loved Hello Dolly as a kid watching it on TV.. love you as well Bette ❤️
@BetteMidler Last night was amazing! Best audience experience I’ve had, but one of the greatest performances I’ve seen. Thank you for the memories ❤️❤️
@BetteMidler My husband and I were able to catch the show. We LOVED❤❤❤ the show. The entire cast was FABULOUS🎉🎉🎉
@BetteMidler Congratulations, Bette. So deserved.
